Articles.Content:
Hello all,

on my Mac the game looks pitch black by night. With pitch black I mean that the ship is not visible at all.

Under my windows install, same amount of mods, the game is much brighter. I can't find a gamma option for the screen.

What do you advise?

add the ambient light adjustment mod: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/71536-0-24-2-Ambient-Light-Adjustment-1-2-0-Who-needs-lights-in-space-!?

provides a sliding bar which lets you make the screen brighter
